data.title: Journalists Killed
data.meta_description: From UNESCO to The Committee to Protect Journalists, here is a shocking list of journalists killed by Israel and militant groups over the last 20+ years, in the Occupied Palestinian Territories, Gaza Strip to aid carrying ships sailing in international waters. The death count is 29 by Israel; 3 by the groups linked to Fatah/PLO;…
